title: DockJob-https-BasicAuth
description: Job runner with web interface. (HTTPS version with basic auth)

title: DockPond
description: Datastore that wraps EBO's around a cloud database and provides swaggerUI interface. Designed for use in a docker container.

env.name: EXTURL
env.label: External URL
env.description: The main URL the webapp needs to use to be accessed and access the services (including http or https, no trailing slash or port)

env.name: EXTPORT
env.label: External PORT
env.description: The main PORT the webapp needs to use to be accessed and access the services

env.name: APIAPP_ENVIROMENT
env.label: Enviroment
env.description: Identifier for the enviroment e.g. DEV/TEST/PROD/etc

env.name: APIAPP_CASS_IPLIST
env.label: Cassandra IP or Host List
env.description: Connection details for cassandra cluster e.g. [ 'cassandra-1', 'cassandra-2', 'cassandra-3' ]

env.name: APIAPP_CASS_PORT
env.label: Cassandra Port
env.description: Connection details for cassandra cluster e.g. 9042

env.name: APIAPP_CASS_REPLICATION
env.label: Replication stratagy
env.description: Replication stratagy to use with keyspace e.g. { 'class': 'SimpleStrategy', 'replication_factor': '3' }

env.name: APIAPP_GITHUBREPOLOCATION
env.label: EBO Git location
env.description: Location of git repo containing EBOs e.g. https://api.github.com/repos/rmetcalf9/dockPondSampleEBOs
